modName: Making a Cat Dragonborn. Katia Managan Race Mod
summary:
One and only Katia Managan from webcomic Prequel Adventure by Kazerad! She is custom meshed and
has basic face expressions.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00][size=4][center][font=Comic Sans MS]
One and only Katia Managan from webcomic Prequel Adventure by Kazerad![/font][/center][/size][/color]
[line]
[size=3]
I was holding this mod for a long time in my hard drive but finally i overcame my laziness and uploaded her.
Custom mesh and face flexes created by me.
There are many Katia mods but with mine i wanted to strike a balance between Skyrim and comic to not make her alienated.
There is only female for now but i want to make some updates to mod in later date.


[/size][size=3]She has a new race that you can access through character creation.
When it comes to stats I've changed them to better resemble Katia:[/size]

[list]
[*][size=2]Mana regeneration is lowered by 40%[/size]
[*][size=2]Basa Mana doubled! (compared to Khajiit)[/size]
[*][size=2]Skills that have lower values than standard races[/size]
[/list]
[color=#00ffff][quote][size=3][color=#00ffff]Why not make her completly not able to regen mana ?

[/color]Because its not fun. It's annoying to forget that you did not drink some potions. Besides if you want hardcore you can always find appropiate mods to make it even harder ;)[/size][/quote][/color]
[center][color=#ff0000][size=3]If You don't like this changes, there is an option in installer that gives her basic stats of Khajiit but her skill types are the same.[/size][/color][/center]

[size=3]There are 2 versions : one for CBBE and other for Vanilla body. If you have the other I'll add more later.
if you don't mind some minor texture issues you can go ahead and install one of those versions. It's only a body texture.
[center]

[color=#00ff00]If there are any issues let me know! I'll try to fix them as soon as i am able.[/color][/center][/size]


[color=#ffff00][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS]Requirements:[/font]
[/size][/color][color=#00ffff][size=4]
[list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?]RaceCompatibility for Skyrim and Dawnguard by [b]TMPhoenix[/b][/url][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?] [/url][/size]
[/list][/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?]
[color=#ffff00][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]F[/size][/font][/color][/url][color=#ffff00][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS]requent Issues:[/font]
[/size][/color]
[list]
[*][size=2]Possible neckseam;[/size]
[*][size=2]Occasional Cloth and Headgear minor clippings ;[/size]
[/list]
[color=#ffff00][size=3][font=Comic Sans MS]To Do:[/font]
[/size][/color]
[list]
[*][size=2]Skyrim SE version;[/size]
[*][size=2]Fill the rest face flexes;[/size]
[*][size=2]Make a male variant;[/size]
[*][size=2]Follower ? I would love to make a deep one. Maybe one day...[/size]
[/list]
[color=#ffff00][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Credits![/size][/font][/color]

[list]
[*]Kazerad for making Prequel Adventure;
[*]TMPhoenix for making RaceCompatibility;
[/list]
P.S if there are any mistakes in my english, I'm sorry. I'm not from english speaking country.
author: Quites
